cards.name: Agamotto
cards.ability: At the start of the game, shuffle 5 spells into your deck.

cards.name: Agatha Harkness
cards.ability: Game Start: Draw Agatha. She controls your cards on even turns.

cards.name: Cobra
cards.ability: Activate: Switch an enemy card here that didn't start in your opponent's deck to your side.

cards.name: Emperor Hulkling
cards.ability: Game Start: Copy the text of a random 6-Cost card.

cards.name: Eson
cards.ability: Legendary. At the start of the game, if all your cards have different Powers, give them +2 Power.

cards.name: Firehair
cards.ability: You can move this once. When this moves, revive one of your destroyed cards here.

cards.name: High Evolutionary
cards.ability: Game Start: Unlock the potential of your cards with no abilities.

cards.name: Redwing
cards.ability: The first time this moves, add a card from your hand to the old location.

cards.name: Starbrand
cards.ability: At the start of the game, +2 Power for each card in your deck with 10 or more Power.

cards.name: Thanos
cards.ability: Game Start: Draw Thanos and shuffle the six Infinity Stones into your deck.

cards.name: Uatu the Watcher
cards.ability: Game Start: You can see the unrevealed locations.

locations.name: Madripoor
locations.ability: After each turn, give each highest-Cost card here +2 Power.

locations.name: Smithsonian Museum
locations.ability: Your cards here have +1 Power for each Ongoing among them.

items.title: Dark Avengers’ Global Bounty
items: Win games using any of the designated Dark Avengers-themed cards: Iron Patriot, Victoria Hand, Moonstone, Luke Cage, USAgent, Daken, Devil Dinosaur
8M Wins - Premium Mystery Variant
10M Wins - 3x Snowflake Red Borders
15M Wins - Exclusive Knull Variant
20M Wins - Exclusive X-23 Variant

items.name: Scream
changes: 2/3 - When an enemy card moves, steal 2 Power from it. (once per turn)

items.name: Spider-Man
changes: 3/5 - On Reveal: Move to another location and pull an enemy card from here to there.

items.name: Luke Cage
changes: 3/3 - Ongoing: Your cards can’t have their Power reduced.

items.name: U.S. Agent
changes: 2/3 - Ongoing: 4, 5, and 6-Cost cards here have -4 Power.
2/3 - Ongoing: 4, 5, and 6-Cost cards here have -3 Power.

items.name: Hydra Bob
changes: 1/5 - After each turn, this moves if a player Snapped.

items.name: Sentry
changes: 4/8 - You can't play this at the right location. On Reveal: Add a -8 Power Void to the right location.
4/9 - You can't play this at the right location. On Reveal: Add a -9 Power Void to the right location

items.name: Onslaught
changes: 6/7 - Ongoing: Double your other Ongoing effects here.

items.name: Hela
changes: 6/7 - On Reveal: Resurrect all cards you discarded to random locations with -3 Power.
6/9 - On Reveal: For each different Cost among them, resurrect a card you discarded to a random location.
